name: GuestGreeting-(GreetMe)

”Alexa, open greet me”
”Alexa, ask greet me to greet my guest in english”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: greet me
des:
Using this skill you can greet your Guest and can also tell them a quote on it. Just say Alexa open greet me and enjoy our kill.
